net.grabsalot.dao.local

Class LocalElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.grabsalot.dao.local.LocalElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollectionElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalAlbum, LocalArtist, LocalCollection, LocalTrack

    public abstract class LocalElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICollectionElement
    Holds information about a local collection element. Also has useful methods.
